extendedInfo.description: Do you like to make paper snowflakes? Then you are going to LOVE making them on Android.Make slight movements with your hands, cut off extra paper, and create a beautiful snowflake â is there anything easier?You became really good and your snowflakes are true masterpieces? Put them in the gallery and get appropriate grades. And if you are a novice then check out the gallery of the best snowflakes. With some practice your own creations will soon be among the best!Features:1. The most convenient way to cut a snowflake â just draw a line of cutting with your finger.2. Increase the size of the image to make more precise cuts.3. Take a look at the snowflake you cut, go back to editing mode and improve it (unlimited version).4. Cancel the last cut you made if you do not like it.5. Save your snowflake to the gallery.6. Review and grade snowflakes in the gallery (new, the best, yours)

reviews.title: Not Bad; Could Be Better
reviews.comment: The amount of cuts is limited which is annoying as I like to make my flakes quite intricate. It bugs when making the cut path sometimes. Works otherwise.
reviews.author: Beata Sajecka

reviews.title: Careful, it\'s addicting
reviews.comment: I loved the free version from the getgo, but I knew I needed ...I mean really Needed, the full version.   There\'s a definite Zen-thing about it, which is why I turn down the music and listen to my own soundtrack. :-)  The folks at FMC are responsive and helpful, too.
reviews.author: Dede Steiner
